name: Vision & Objectives
description: Project vision and measurable objectives aligned with discovery findings
validation_criteria: Clear problem statement referenced; 2-3 measurable objectives with KPIs; alignment with research synthesis
input_sources: brainstorming output; research synthesis; strategy docs

name: Users & Personas
description: Target users and personas with jobs-to-be-done
validation_criteria: At least 2 personas referenced; JTBD documented; user segments defined with size estimates
input_sources: research personas (.epct/research/personas/); brainstorming BT-032 Empathy Map

name: Features
validation_criteria: Features categorized as Must/Should/Could/Won't; each feature maps to a user need; acceptance criteria defined
input_sources: brainstorming top ideas; research validated hypotheses

name: Technical Requirements
validation_criteria: Tech stack specified; integration requirements listed; performance targets defined; security requirements noted

name: Success Metrics
validation_criteria: At least 3 quantitative KPIs; measurement method defined for each; baseline and target values set

name: Risks & Mitigations
validation_criteria: At least 3 risks identified; each risk has probability and impact rating; mitigation plan for high risks
input_sources: brainstorming BT-039 Pre-Mortem; research red flags

name: Timeline
validation_criteria: Phases or milestones defined; dependencies identified; realistic estimates based on scope
